keyEvents.title: Kuja Banquet with Luffy
keyEvents.description: Luffy entertains the Kuja warriors with his Gomu Gomu no Haragi technique at a banquet celebrating his stay on the island.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Luffy's integration into Kuja society before his departure.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Learns of Ace's Execution
keyEvents.description: On Amazon Lily, Luffy learns from Nyon that his brother Ace is scheduled to be executed at Marineford in five days.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Luffy's mission changes from crew reunion to brother rescue.

keyEvents.title: Hancock Develops Love Sickness
keyEvents.description: Hancock contracts love sickness on Amazon Lily after falling in love with Luffy, experiencing the same disease that killed previous empresses.
keyEvents.significance: A pivotal moment in Amazon Lily's history as an empress contracts the legendary love sickness.

geographicFeatures: An island in the Calm Belt inhabited exclusively by the Kuja tribe of warrior women. Protected from Sea Kings by domesticated Yuda sea serpents.
politicalStatus: Independent nation ruled by an empress
historicalSignificance: Home of the Kuja Pirates and the Shichibukai Boa Hancock. Known for the love sickness disease that has claimed previous empresses.

keyEvents.title: Introduction to Impel Down
keyEvents.description: Nyon explains to Luffy that Impel Down is the World Government's maximum security underwater prison where Ace is being held.
keyEvents.significance: First mention of the prison that will be the setting for the next major arc.

geographicFeatures: A massive underwater prison fortress located in the Calm Belt. Known as the world's most secure detention facility.
historicalSignificance: Houses the world's most dangerous criminals. Where Portgas D. Ace is imprisoned before his scheduled execution.

keyEvents.title: Ace's Execution Site Announced
keyEvents.description: Marineford is revealed as the location where Portgas D. Ace will be executed in five days, serving as bait to lure out Whitebeard.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up Marineford as the site of the impending war between the Marines and Whitebeard Pirates.

geographicFeatures: Marine Headquarters, a massive military fortress and the center of Marine operations.
historicalSignificance: The announced site of Ace's execution and the impending war that will shake the world.
